PageTitle: display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 forwarding
FuncDef: The display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 forwarding command displays information about local SRv6 End.DX6 SID tables.
CLIs: display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 [ <sid> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] forwarding

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv6 SID.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays information about local SRv6 SID tables based on a specified VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 forwarding
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 forwarding command displays the End.DX6 SID information.
You can also query the specified End.DX6 type SID based on the VPN instance, for example: display segment-routing ipv6 local-sid end-dx6 vpn-instance vpn-name forwarding.
